Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 行商人
Entry.EnglishText: Peddler

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: アルヴァン山脈
Entry.EnglishText: Alvan Mountains

Entry.JapaneseText: アルヴァン山脈
Entry.EnglishText: Alvan Mountains

Entry.JapaneseText: こんにちは。 色々、扱ってるけど、 何か欲しいものはあるかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Good day! I brought a lot of things with me, would you like to buy something?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 品物を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあね。
Entry.EnglishText: See ya!

Entry.JapaneseText: 毎度、ありがとう！
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you! Come again next time!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたら、ミナールに行くのかい？ それならこの先、 ミナール平原を抜ければすぐさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Are you all heading out to Minal? If so, it should be just past The Minal Plains up ahead.

Entry.JapaneseText: 間違っても その脇にあるエトレー橋を 渡っちゃいけないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Even if it was by accident, you shouldn't cross Etoray Bridge.

Entry.JapaneseText: しばらくここで商売しててさ、 久々に仕入れに街へ行ったら 様子がおかしいんだよね。
Entry.EnglishText: I've been doing business here for a while, and when I went to town to stock up, something felt off.

Entry.JapaneseText: どこの街へ行っても、 ヒューマとガジュマが ケンカしててさ……
Entry.EnglishText: It seemed like the Huma and Gajuma are at each other's throats no matter where I go.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何かあったのかねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what happened...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 久しぶりにミナールへ 仕入れに行ったんだけどさ まいったよ……
Entry.EnglishText: So I went to Minal to stock up on supplies recently...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの業者から仕入れる時に 「ガジュマには絶対に売るな」って 言われたんだよ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...and when I went to restock from a Huma merchant, they told me "Don't you ever sell this to a Gajuma."

Entry.JapaneseText: そうは言っても 商売だからねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: Even if you tell me that, I still have to do my job...

Entry.JapaneseText: この前さ、ベルサスから逃げて来た っていうガジュマに会ったんだけど 大変だったんだって……!?
Entry.EnglishText: I saw a Gajuma running away from Belsas a while ago saying it was horrible...

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様だか、そっくりさんだかが 処刑されそうになったって…… 世も末だなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Looks like the queen, or her look-alike was about to be executed. What has the world come to?

Entry.JapaneseText: ま、俺は関係なく バリバリ商売するよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Well, doesn't matter to me! I'll just focus on my job!

Entry.JapaneseText: ついこの前来たお客さんが 世の中大変だっていうのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Recently a customer told me that there's something wrong with society.

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダは沈んだっていうし、 空は変な色になってるって……
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda's started to sink and the sky's turned an ominous color...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、アルヴァンの山は、 いつも吹雪いてるし、 実感ないんだよねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't feel like anything's different because there's always a blizzard in the Alvan Mountains.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしてこんなところで 商売してるかって？
Entry.EnglishText: Why did I even decide to set up shop in a place like this?

Entry.JapaneseText: 商売を成功させる秘訣は 周りに競合する店がない事！ これに限るね。
Entry.EnglishText: The secret to commercial success is setting up business where there's little to no competition! That's all!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……これでもうちょっと お客さんが来ればなあ……
Entry.EnglishText: Now if only some customers would come...

Entry.JapaneseText: えいッ！
Entry.EnglishText: Take that!

Entry.JapaneseText: 山小屋に戻る場合は ここから登ればいい。
Entry.EnglishText: With this, we should be able to get back to the shack at the peak with ease.

Entry.JapaneseText: なるほど。
Entry.EnglishText: I see...

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ、戻るの？
Entry.EnglishText: Wait, we're going back?

Entry.JapaneseText: 戻る場合について話しただけだ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's just in case we need to.

Entry.JapaneseText: そういうコトね。 じゃ、行こっか！
Entry.EnglishText: Ohhh I get it now. Let's go!

Entry.JapaneseText: この先は、雪解け水が凍りついて 滑りやすくなっている。 足元に気をつけるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Ice from the snowmelt is making the ground slippery. Watch your step.

Entry.JapaneseText: わかった。
Entry.EnglishText: Right.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
